lead_paragraph: Steve Kerr joined the Warriors' record run on a full-time basis in January, and after Golden State set the NBA single-season record with 73 wins, he was voted the 2015-16 Coach of the Year.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Kerr Named Coach of the Year
headline.main: Warriors Kerr Named Coach of the Year

snippet: Steve Kerr joined the Warriors' record run on a full-time basis in January, and after Golden State set the NBA single-season record with 73 wins, he was voted the 2015-16 Coach of the Year....
